title: Joplin
description: In Joplin, Missouri, a mother tries to protect her teenage daughter from an abusive relationship and is forced to deal with the demons in her own past.
quote: I don’t want you to make the same mistakes that I did.
creator: Sally Reed
alt2: Katie Harris as Chloe talking in a therapy session
alt4: profile of Chloe’s face with her mother in the background
